description:
Game have 2 moods:

*you should use joystick to play game.

1- first mode:

you play against your friend to prov how best by:racing to transfer of people from the building to your space ship and your should be careful from the monster.

2-second mode:

you play with your friend to collect (power cube).... one play with car to collect and the another use gun to protect his friend form monsters.

Trailer game

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9XPDmCykhj8
